scalp.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: the skin on the top of your head
scalp.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Massage the shampoo gently into your hair and scalp.
scalp.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to buy tickets for an event and sell them again at a much higher price
scalp.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to cut the hair and skin off the head of a dead enemy as a sign of victory
scalp.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: to buy tickets for an event and sell them again at a much higher price
scalp.translation[2].definitions[0].exam: guys that scalp tickets outside the stadium
scalp.translation[2].definitions[1].defi: to buy and quickly sell small quantities of SECURITIES (=bonds, shares etc), in order to make small but fast profits
scalp.translation[2].definitions[1].exam: Traders try to scalp profits as contract prices rise and fall.
